name: PREACOGDO
Use: Grants the user the ability to peer into the future, past, or present, related to themselves to a certain extent. Upon consumption, the rest of the fruit vanishes, and the user cannot gain an ability from another fruit of a similar nature and is unable to touch purified water.
Location: Forest
Preparation: Eating (one bite makes the rest vanish)

name: PROBODO
Use: Grants the user the ability to alter their own probability to an extent. Upon consumption, the rest of the fruit vanishes, and the user cannot gain an ability from another fruit of a similar nature and is unable to touch purified water.
Location: Forest
Preparation: Eating (one bite makes the rest vanish)

name: LIGHTONSUNDO
Use: Grants the ability to create and control light around the user at will, making it tangible or fluid and manipulating it, including as bursts of light. Also grants a large increase in speed, the ability to fly (body weighs nothing), travel through sources of light (moving through reflections), and make the body completely transparent or change how others see it, granting limited illusion creation. Upon consumption, the rest of the fruit vanishes, and the user cannot gain an ability from another fruit of a similar nature and is unable to touch purified water.
Location: Forest
Preparation: Eating (one bite makes the rest vanish)

name: ETERNA BLOOM
Use: Grants immortality by constantly regenerating the user's body on a cellular level, making them ageless and immune to diseases or injuries. It must be consumed in its entirety for the effect to work, though it is said to come with a heavy price.
Location: Unknown
Preparation: Must be consumed (in its entirety)

name: WEIGHDO
Use: Grants the ability to alter the weight of their body from anywhere between 1 to 100,000 kilograms at will. Upon consumption, the rest of the fruit vanishes, and the user cannot gain an ability from another fruit of a similar nature and is unable to touch purified water.
Location: Forest
Preparation: Eating (one bite makes the rest vanish)

name: SPIRTDDO
Use: Grants the ability to communicate with the spirits that linger in the land of the souls, being able to not only see them but also be on friendly terms with non-hostile spirits. The user is more prone to being helped by spirits and can interact with the land of the spirits (speak, touch). The user can also allow a spirit to temporarily possess their body at their own risk. Upon consumption, the rest of the fruit vanishes, and the user cannot gain an ability from another fruit of a similar nature and is unable to touch purified water.
Location: Forest
Preparation: Eating (one bite makes the rest vanish)

name: ZELIODD
Use: Grants the ability to turn their body into a hive of small holes and from these holes, create swarms of insects (common or lower-ranked fauna insects with a queen). The user can create an almost infinite number as long as they have the mana and mass to sustain it, as each insect created takes away from their mass. The user will also not die as long as one of the insects remains, reforming their body from the insect but losing all strength, abilities, and capabilities aside from the fruit itself. Upon consumption, the rest of the fruit vanishes, and the user cannot gain an ability from another fruit of a similar nature and is unable to touch purified water.
Location: Forest
Preparation: Eating (one bite makes the rest vanish)

name: INTAGADO
Use: Grants the user the ability to completely make their body intangible from physical, magical, and even soul-related matters. In this form, however, they also can't do anything and cannot move. Upon consumption, the rest of the fruit vanishes, and the user cannot gain an ability from another fruit of a similar nature and is unable to touch purified water.
Location: Forest
Preparation: Eating (one bite makes the rest vanish)

name: MASHDO
Use: Grants the ability to create and manipulate a type of soft, marshmallow-like material at will that is able to absorb the impact of things. If it touches water, it also absorbs it and expands. Upon consumption, the rest of the fruit vanishes, and the user cannot gain an ability from another fruit of a similar nature and is unable to touch purified water.
Location: Forest
Preparation: Eating (one bite makes the rest vanish)

name: BARRIERDO
Use: Grants the ability to create and manipulate a semi-transparent barrier at will. Upon consumption, the rest of the fruit vanishes, and the user cannot gain an ability from another fruit of a similar nature and is unable to touch purified water.
Location: Forest
Preparation: Eating (one bite makes the rest vanish)

name: AGIDO
Use: Grants the ability to use their age as a weapon. Upon eating the fruit, the user gains the ability to use their lifespan as a means to gain strength, and for every year of their lifespan that they burn, they will gain a temporary boost in power. This change physically and mentally affects them, as their body changes to show their change in lifespan. Upon consumption, the rest of the fruit vanishes, and the user cannot gain an ability from another fruit of a similar nature and is unable to touch purified water.
Location: Forest
Preparation: Eating (one bite makes the rest vanish)

name: READO
Use: Grants the user the ability to resurrect upon death once. However, the time it takes for them can be anywhere between 1 hour to 1 year; as such, the state their body is in when they resurrect depends on the time past. Upon consumption, the rest of the fruit vanishes, and the user cannot gain an ability from another fruit of a similar nature and is unable to touch purified water.
Location: Forest
Preparation: Eating (one bite makes the rest vanish)

name: PHOENIX BLOOM
Use: Holds the power of resurrection and rebirth, allowing the person that inhales the burnt ashes of the flower to return from death with a new body. The user must have died within the past month, and the resurrection will bring them back to life with full health but drained mana.
Location: Volcano and Firelands (believed to form where a large number of Phoenixes die over hundreds of years; no two flowers form in the same area)
Preparation: Must be burned and ashes must be consumed (inhaled).
region: volcano and firelands believed form where a large number phoenixes die over hundreds years no two flowers form same area

name: ENLIGHTENMENT
Use: This plant is able to answer 3 questions the user has in their mind.
Location: Forest (only grows within dense magical areas, randomly)
Preparation: Grinding

name: Crystal Apple
Use: This fruit is said to absorb the essence of any living thing around it, including mana, and fuse it into itself. This gives the fruit the ability to boost the ability of anything that eats it, equivalent to how much it has absorbed. It is near impossible to find.
Location: Dragon Realm
Preparation: None.

name: PLANDO
Use: Grants the ability to create and control plants at will, being able to even change their body into a completely nature form that is akin to a plant. Upon consumption, the rest of the fruit vanishes, and the user cannot gain an ability from another fruit of a similar nature and is unable to touch purified water.
Location: Forest
Preparation: Eating (one bite makes the rest vanish)

name: MAGMADO
Use: Grants the ability to create and control magma at will. Upon consumption, the rest of the fruit vanishes, and the user cannot gain an ability from another fruit of a similar nature and is unable to touch purified water.
Location: Forest
Preparation: Eating (one bite makes the rest vanish)

name: ICEDO
Use: Grants the ability to create and control ice. Upon consumption, the rest of the fruit vanishes, and the user cannot gain an ability from another fruit of a similar nature and is unable to touch purified water.
Location: Forest
Preparation: Eating (one bite makes the rest vanish)

name: LIGHTNINDO
Use: Grants the ability to create lightning from their body and use it as a form of attack. Also grants the user enhanced speed and the ability to heal themselves by absorbing lightning. Upon consumption, the rest of the fruit vanishes, and the user cannot gain an ability from another fruit of a similar nature and is unable to touch purified water.
Location: Forest
Preparation: Eating (one bite makes the rest vanish)

name: MAGNODO
Use: Grants the user the ability to control magnetic objects within a certain range of them within limits. Upon consumption, the rest of the fruit vanishes, and the user cannot gain an ability from another fruit of a similar nature and is unable to touch purified water.
Location: Forest
Preparation: Eating (one bite makes the rest vanish)

name: SHUDDO
Use: Grants the user the ability to control shadows around them at will, even making them tangible. Upon consumption, the rest of the fruit vanishes, and the user cannot gain an ability from another fruit of a similar nature and is unable to touch purified water.
Location: Forest
Preparation: Eating (one bite makes the rest vanish)

name: BLESSED ROSE
Use: When consumed, it grants the user an enhanced healing factor that can heal injuries much faster than normal, being able to heal a person 15x faster than a normal human for 5 turns. The flower's nectar can be used to create a healing potion with lesser effectivity. Consuming too much nectar can cause disorientation and dizziness.
Location: Forests, Mountains, and Plains. Only blooms once every ten years in specific regions.
Preparation: Must be consumed (petals can be eaten raw, nectar is most potent).

name: NECROTIC BLOSSOM
Use: Has the power to summon the dead even in its flowery form, constantly making undead zombies and skeletons around it to protect itself (up to 50 at a time). It dies upon leaving its dirt and constantly attacks.
Location: Grows exclusively in Graveyards, Tombs, and Crypts in certain conditions.
Preparation: None (dies when removed from dirt, difficult to reach/harvest due to constant attacks)
region: grows exclusively graveyards tombs and crypts certain conditions

name: MYSTIKK FRUIT
Use: Consuming one grants/increases the user's elemental affinity (for the fruit's element: Water, Ice, Fire, Nature, Wind, Earth, Dark, Light) by 40%-80%. Does not work for those with already high elemental affinity (4X or above). Consuming fruits within a week of each other decreases elemental affinity. Each time a fruit of the same affinity is eaten, the amount gained decreases.
Location: Certain kinds only grow in certain climates: Fire & Earth (Desert), Wind & Light (Mountains), Dark (Caves), Nature (Forests), Water (Oceans), Ice (Tundra).
Preparation: Must be consumed.

name: TELEABLOOM
Use: When chewed, it allows the user to teleport to any location that they have previously visited, as long as they have a clear image of that place in mind. It works regardless of distance or obstacles, as long as something magical isn't preventing it.
Location: Unknown (grows randomly, teleports to a new place every few days)
Preparation: Must be chewed.
region: unknown grows randomly teleports a new place every few days

name: LUMINOUS NIGHTSHADE
Use: Grants the consumer enhanced light and dark powers, providing a 10% Resistance and 15% Affinity for Light and Dark (depending on the cherry eaten). Eating large amounts grants the ability to control either light or darkness within a limited range. Should be consumed with caution by those without sufficient mastery over their powers due to adverse effects (overwhelming bursts of light/darkness).
Location: Grows in special dark and bright places.
Preparation: Must be consumed.
region: grows special dark and bright places

name: PHYSPHER
Use: When prepared and consumed, it turns the user intangible for 2 turns. Highly reactive with combustion, as it must be consumed while on fire for the effect to occur (fumes alone do not work).
Location: Grows underground inside highly magically potent crystalline structures or rocks, like magic geodes.
Preparation: Remove flowers from stalk. Separate the leaves and burn when eating.
region: grows underground inside highly magically potent crystalline structures or rocks like magic geodes

name: GORGAN'S TALE
Use: The purple edges of the petals are extremely dangerous; biting them causes the target to slowly start turning to stone (from outside in), a process taking 10 days with little known cure. The inner green part of the petals, once consumed, can cure most poisons, including its own petrification effect.
Location: None (implied to be very rare or specific to certain conditions, as the region is "None")
Preparation: Very carefully cutting (to separate dangerous purple from curative green).
Cost: 35 Gold for the green part; purple not sold.
region: none implied be very rare or specific certain conditions as region is none

name: Autymopal
Use: The honey-like center is edible and often bottled in Chusei to be used as various syrups or honeys. Its leaves, when burned for one minute, leave a smell repulsive to mana entities, making them prized by religious entities for warding off spirits or harmful mana entities. Placing the flower (without its gooey interior) on a grave in Chusei is a sign of respect and community recognition.
Location: Indigenous to Chusei only (grows on trees).
Preparation: Honey-like center is scooped out and boiled with various liquids to create various tasting syrups. Leaves are to be burned for one minute.

name: ELECTRICORAL
Use: At night, it creates a visible field of electricity around it, creating a safe haven for fishy fauna. When consumed (leaves brewed into liquid), it allows the consumer to control blasts of electricity for 10 turns, but in turn, they are much weaker to fire spells.
Location: Oceans, Coral Reefs (Fantails, found in the reefs of The Grand Blue).
Preparation: Leaves must be brewed into liquid.

name: REEF TICKLER
Use: When prepared properly, it grants the consumer an 80% reduction in the effectiveness of D Rank and below toxins or poisons for 5 turns. It is also important for the continued survival of coral reefs.
Location: Oceans, Coral Reefs.
Preparation: Boiled into liquid, similar to nettle or saffron.

name: GENDO
Use: Grants the user the ability to change their own gender at will, without a time limit, and also the gender of others they touch for a limited time. Upon consumption, the rest of the fruit vanishes, and the user cannot gain an ability from another fruit of a similar nature and is unable to touch purified water.
Location: Forest
Preparation: Eating (one bite makes the rest vanish)

name: SANDO
Use: Grants the ability to create and control sand at will. Upon consumption, the rest of the fruit vanishes, and the user cannot gain an ability from another fruit of a similar nature and is unable to touch purified water.
Location: Forest
Preparation: Eating (one bite makes the rest vanish)

Use: Grants the ability to create and control smoke at will. Upon consumption, the rest of the fruit vanishes, and the user cannot gain an ability from another fruit of a similar nature and is unable to touch purified water.
Location: Forest
Preparation: Eating (one bite makes the rest vanish)

name: SPIAKDO
Use: Grants the user the ability to create and shoot out spikes from their body at will. Upon consumption, the rest of the fruit vanishes, and the user cannot gain an ability from another fruit of a similar nature and is unable to touch purified water.
Location: Forest
